name: Saturn Armchair
description: The Saturn armchair and Saturnino pouf were designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 2014. This suite, created for a corner of the home dedicated to rest and relaxation, includes other pieces like the Lampo lamp and the Fagiolo side table. The chair and pouf feature padded curved plywood with upholstery options in fabric, leather, or natural leather. The design reflects 1900s style with a modern reinterpretation.
